1.1 $msg.get("This is the Documentation for the AdWordsJump Landing Page") 1.1.1 The AdWordsJump module contains these resources the TestLandingPage is a sample page for Landing page 1. AdWordsJump/AdWordsInfoClass 1. AdWordsJump/LandingPageLog 1. AdWordsJump/LandingPageLogTemplate 1. AdWordsJump/LandingPageTemplate 1. AdWordsJump/TestLandingPage 1. AdWordsJump/Translations 1. AdWordsJump/WebPreferences

1.1.1 How to create new AdWordsJump Landing page? If you are first create new AdWordsJump Landing page, please follow the steps below. 1.1.1.1 Step 1 First, import the resources above into the system. 1.1.1.1 Step 2 Add AdWordsJump Translation file 'AdWordsJump.Translations' to 'Internationalization Document Bundles'
use this url '/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences', the 'Internationalization Document Bundles' is under chapter 'Advanced' or 'Programming'. 1.1.1.1 Step 3 Create an AdWordsJump Landing page, for example, AdWordsJump.FreeWorksheet, then copy the contents below into the page you just created: {code} #set($keyword="free worksheets") #set($subject="UnitedStatesHistory") #set($subjectparent="SocialStudies") #set($btn_value = "Find Worksheet") #set($left_title_1="

Created by Teachers for You

") #set($left_title_1_desc="We believe that access to knowledge and learning tools is a basic right for every child. Our goal is to make curricula and learning resources available to everyone.") #set($left_title_2="Feautured Examples") #includeForm("AdWordsJump.LandingPageTemplate") #pageTitle("

Thousands of

") #pageTitle("

Free Worksheets

") #pageTitle("

For Math,English,and Science

") #sampleLink("Word Problems for grades 3 to 5" "/xwiki/bin/view/AdWordsJump/TestLandingPage?xpage=popup" "Covers a variety of topics,including addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, graphs, place value, writing big numbers, and more, I use these for my daily math review in my classroom") #sampleLink("A complete introductory Biology course" "/xwiki/bin/view/AdWordsJump/TestLandingPage?xpage=popup" "A set of digital video clips with worksheets, powerpoint presentations, online activities, and online tests.") #sampleLink("English unit for \"Death of a Salesman\" by Arthur Miller" "/xwiki/bin/view/AdWordsJump/TestLandingPage?xpage=popup" "Includes prereading activities, complete vocabulary activities, complete reading guides, writing activities, target skills, supplementary reading, and assignments.") {code} Notes: 1. The "$keyword" indicate the type of the Landing page. 1. The "$subject" is the subject you will search, if you set this variable, it will search the special subject, otherwise, it will search all subjects. 1. The "$subjectparent" is the subject's parent you will search, if you have set the "$subject", you will need to set this variable too. 1. The "$btn_value" is the text show on the search button. 1. The "$left_title_1", "$left_title_1_desc", "$left_title_2" define the title and description at the left top, and may be you need not to change it. 1. The "\#pageTitle" is the macro that add the title at the top green area, it is defined as "\#macro(pageTitle \$title)". You can set the size of the word as the sample code. 1. The "\#sampleLink" is the macro that add the aample link title and description at the left, it is defined as "\#macro(sampleLink \$title \$link \$desc)". You need to change some of them to your self's. #warning("Because we need create and store log page, and this landing page is visited by guest, please make sure this landing page's author has programming rights") 1.1.1.1 Step 4 Now you can view the new Landing page from the url "/xwiki/bin/view/AdWordsJump/FreeWorksheet?xpage=popup", and do some search. The search content will be record in the system. 1.1.1.1 Step 5 You can view search records in the log page with the url "/xwiki/bin/view/AdWordsJump/LandingPageLog". This page contains all the Landing page logs, you can click into one to view each Landing page log.
